TopicTitle: SCF Home base + 7/8/15 Spacecraft friday [Looking for you!]

Articles.Content:
Still not even 2:00pm here. That means I get to endure 90+ degree heat for the next six hours. 

That's Fahrenheit, not Celsius, mind you. U S A!! U S A!!

Im EST. So the thread should be up 3 hours from now. Currently in the hospital on that guest wifi ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Sorry guys for some it will be saturday morning ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

I should do the spscecraft fridays at 6:00 Pm like 2 hours from now. Sorry for inconvenience because of timrzomes ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

> 
> I should do the spscecraft fridays at 6:00 Pm like 2 hours from now. Sorry for inconvenience because of timrzomes ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

It's fine! It's not your fault that you are in a different timezone. This allows more last minute submissions I guess ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Ok guys after a brief moment of the forums not connecting... I am able to connect and should be good to go to post the SPF ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Thank you for your patience. Good luck to everyone's crafts... I check around 4 pages back.... to ensure the best ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Thanks KSP forums for fixing the connection issues....

question: what if i post not a single craft, but a craft-pack in a single thread like all my russian stuff in one go? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yes, craft packs are accepted in SCF.
So, has it been decided who is doing this week then?

Sooooo....it's Thursday here, no pressure

YargJay9991 

The Replica Guy

It looks like my U-Boat won't be ready in time for this week's SCF, especially since Yukon's doing it, Friday night for him is either Thursday night or Friday morning for me. And since I appear to be doing it next week, the U-Boat is going to have to be held back another week so it has a chance of being featured.

Hell.
Dammit, call off the Swordfish attack guys!
Don't worry guys, I'll release this one later than I released my irst one. Definitely.
